name: Shermag_Bonded_Leather_Occasional_Armchair
reviews: Nice chair. A bit hard but comfortable for my nap. Easy to put together.
description: Get cozy in your home with this Shermag leather occasional armchair. Upholstered with black leather, this ultra-soft chair is perfect for any room where you want to sit and relax. The comfortable, contemporary designed seating is perfect for any family room as it creates a comfortable and welcoming atmosphere for family and friends. The comfortable bustle back design with rounded, tight, padded arms gives this motion chair an inviting look to accent your room. The extra padded seat and back give optimal comfort, and the side lever allows the chair to recline to any position. This chair also has an ultra-smooth swivel base, so that you can be part of any conversation, anywhere in the room.Chair Type: ReclinersMaterial: Bonded Leather, WoodStyle: Contemporary, TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredColor: Black, Grey, Beige, BrownStyleContemporary, TransitionalMaterialBonded Leather, WoodChair TypeReclinersAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBeige, Black, Brown, Grey
